xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/27190-A Muppets Christmas: Letters to Santa 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/zDxpOQi7kkokDLxZkVQhejp2VHu.jpg When Gonzo forgets to mail three letters to Santa, he convinces Kermit and the gang to help him deliver the notes to the North Pole. Along the way, they discover that Christmas is the time to be with those you care about most, as they dash home to make a friends Christmas wish come true. A Muppets Christmas: Letters to Santa
